name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: Lovely shade of lipstick and package is nice looks expensive but it doesn’t stay on long but I don’t think many of the creamy ones do the Matt ones tend to stay on longer I find

review: I bought the classic mauve , it’s darker than it looks in the picture so I can’t use it for day wear but it’s a nice smooth lipstick & stays on well . I’d recommend it .

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: Ok so my headline actually refers to another beauty manufacturer, but I wouldn't skimp or go elsewhere.  Kiko makeup is absolutely gorgeous and well worth buying.  Their lipsticks & lip glosses are divine.  What are you waiting for - get buying!!  (and no I'm not on commission and am a genuine customer!!)
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 1 February 2024

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: Ne ho acquistati due, un nude più rosato(03)ed uno più marrone (02).Molto confortevoli e a lunga tenuta. Non seccano le labbra. Il colore è bellissimo, la tenuta ottima.Assolutamente consigliato!Spedizione perfetta, come sempre.NB è un rossetto, però, non una tinta, quindi va via mangiando. Lascia un velo di colore uniforme.
date: Reviewed in Italy on 28 January 2024

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: It’s actually very good and long lasting. After a few minutes it dries and doesn’t transfer anymore, and stays on my lips all day even if I eat in the meanwhile. Also did not make my lips dry. I am going to buy other colors soon.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2024

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick

review: Älskar Kikos läppsprodukter. Den gjorde mig inte besviken, mycket bra produkt..Har alla eller nästan alla deras färger..

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: I got 03 Natural Rose and it's the perfect "my lips but better" shade. I have a light skin tone and my lips are a light pinkish-red, and this is that but more pigmented and it accentuates the colour of my lips. Plus the colour on the pictures shown is pretty accurate to IRL. The packaging too is very cute and the scent is a fairly strong vanilla.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 8 July 2022

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: The lipstick was a lot smaller than I had thought, however I soon realized it is a very practical size. The color is no. 6 warm rose and goes perfect if you have ivory skin tone. It brights colour to the face but also does not overpower it by making you look old.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2024

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: Couleur magnifique mais ne tient pas lgtps
date: Reviewed in Belgium on 30 August 2023

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: Love KIKO products especial their lip products. Stylish packaging, creamy and moisturising rich product. Brick red has a slight leaning to a warmer red on the colour spectrum which suits my warm skin tone. Perfect for a lady with a full Cupid bow/pout.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2024

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: I wanted a red lipstick, came across this brand. The feel on the skin was not to be expected as the unsophisticated formulation was disappointing. Very cheap feeling, felt like it dragged across the lip and only stained did not have any staying power. Very drying on the lip. Nicely packaged but will avoid this brand in future.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2024

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
review: Have tried a few of the products now and I'm always happy
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 23 June 2023

name: KIKO Milano Unlimited Stylo 01 | Long-Lasting 10-Hour Hold Creamy Lipstick
